text: Jean-Pierre Bacri (24 May 1951 - 18 January 2021) was an Algerian-born French actor and screenwriter. He was born in Bou Ismaïl, Algeria. Bacri was known for his movie roles in Same Old Song and Place Vendôme. He was also known for writing the screenplay for The Taste of Others. Bacri died of cancer in Paris on 18 January 2021 at the age of 69.Jean-Pierre Bacri est mort ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:Algerian actors Category:Cancer deaths in France
title: Jean-Pierre Bacri
